DOC.criteria: history ocular allergy positive skin test reaction cat hair , cat dander , grass , ragweed , and/or tree within past 24 month ; calculate bestcorrected visual acuity 0.6 logMar good eye ; positive bilateral conjunctival allergy challenge reaction narrow angle glaucoma , clinically significant blepharitis , follicular conjunctivitis , iritis pterygium diagnosis dry eye ocular surgical intervention within 3 month history refractive surgery within 6 month know history retinal detachment , diabetic retinopathy , progressive retinal disease presence active ocular infection positive history ocular herpetic infection preauricular lymphadenopath manifest sign symptom clinically active allergic conjunctivitis
